item.description:
Update 01/10/12: Please be aware that this play contains three scenes that include male nudity.  You may read a review of the play at this link on EastBayRI.com.

Update 01/11/12: Added dinner option at The Admiral English Pub.

For this Meet-up we will return to the 2nd Story Theater in Warren, RI for "Take Me Out." Here is the description of the play from 2nd Story's brochure:

"A home run Broadway hit, Greenberg's witty, passionate, and patriotic look a the great American pastime sneaks a peek into that most exclusive of boys' clubs: the locker room of a major league ball team.  When the NY Empire's star player comes out to the press with a closely held secret, assumptions are challenged, tradition is upended, friendships are tested, and the question of what it is to be American is explored in a naked and unflinchingly honest way."

Ticket Information

Tickets are $25.  Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please call the 2nd Story Theater at 401-247-4200.

Please Note that Friday nights at 2nd Story do sell out early. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

When you order your ticket, please tell them you are a member of this group.  They will then reserve our seats together.

Dinner Information

Dinner for those that are interested will be at The Admiral English Pub, 267 Water Street, Warren, RI.

Here is their menu.

For those that will be attending dinner, reservations will be made under "Ron Correia" for 6:00 PM.

Cost of dinner will be handled as follows:

Drinks will be consigned to a separate check from the meal. Each person will add 30% to the price of their drink to cover the 8% RI Tax plus a 20% tip.

The meal will be on one check. A 20% tip will be added to the total and meal check will be divided evenly by the number of people attending the dinner.

I will send an e-mail including my cell phone number to all who RSVP "yes". If you will not make it to the restaurant by 6:00 PM please let me know.

Dinner is optional and is not included in the price of the ticket.

Meet-up Logistics

There is a fairly large parking lot located next to the theater between Market Street and Route 114 in Warren. A sign for Second Story Theater is on Route 114, although it's somewhat hidden.

If you are attending dinner, reservations will be under "Ron Correia."  Meet at our table by 6:00 PM.  If you are not attending dinner, identify yourself as a member of this group when you arrive at the theater and they will show you to our seats.
item.name: Take Me Out
